ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:27:43 [Issue ID 4000-534347] urn:comicvine:4000-534347 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 13:02:46. [Issue ID 1581990]
ComicInfo.Summary:
EIGHTEEN FOREVER, PART TWO
When an old foe returns offering friendship, the survivors of the assault on Arcane Acre search for a night of peace of the eve before their final conflict with Bloody Bones. With their lives on the line, and nothing left to lose, the kids put everything on the table and offer their final goodbyes.
Also, Bloody Bones unleashes the Kraken. No, really.
